data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Jihomoravský. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jihomoravský, Czechia

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Jihomoravský, Czechia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,817 believers in Jihomoravský to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Jihomoravský, Czechia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, bring yourself glory in Jihomoravský. Through your servants plant 239 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Jihomoravský, Czechia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jihomoravský, Czechia has a population of 1,196,100.

We estimate Jihomoravský has 8,817 people who might know Jesus, 312,164 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 875,119 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 135 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Jihomoravský, Czechia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
